directions.text: Highlight any proper nouns and underline any common nouns in the sentences below.

help.text:
Word Workbench Help
Answering Questions
Read the directions at the start of the activity.
Read the words or sentences underneath the directions.Select the right tool from the workbench at the bottom of the screen. You can use your tools to highight a word, underline a word, identify a single letter, or divide a word.
Once your tool is selected, click or tap on the word where you want to use it. If you on a tablet device, tap twice to confirm where you want to use the tool.
If you want to change your edits, select the Erase tool, and then select the word, or letter you want to change.
As an alternative to the mouse, the keyboard may be used. Press Tab to move to a desired tool or location, and then press Space to select your tool or word.
Use the Check button to find out if your answer is correct.
If the answer is incorrect, use the Try Again button, then choose a new answer.
Use the Show Correct Answer and Back to Answer buttons to compare correct answers and your responses.
Use the Previous and Next buttons to navigate between question screens. You may review previous answers.
Top Buttons
Use the button with the question mark to come back to this help page.
Use the button with the X to close the activity.
Use the button with the speaker to mute automatic audio feedback."
